attributes.action: Ensure that the prejudice against parents in Family Court cases is balanced by establishing an American style Public Defenders Office.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Although the welfare of children is paramount, too much creedence is given to Social Workers opinions and prejudices, too many children are taken from their parents and adopted without the parents having been represented properly.  Social Workers should be made made more accountable for their opinions which can destroy families. Establishing a Public Defender´s Office whose job is to ensure that parents get justice will ensure the public have more trust in the system.
